## BasicRowSelectorComponent.isSelected() method

Gets indication whether item is currently selected

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isSelected(item: TData): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  item | <code>TData</code> | Item that is tested for current selection |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
